channel.title: Logo on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Logo on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: Simply statistics logo contest
item.description: Simply Statistics has had the same logo since Roger grabbed the first picture in his results folder that looked “statistics related”. While we do have some affection for the logo, we would like something a little more catchy. So we would like to announce a contest to create our newÂ logo. Here are the rules: All submissions must be sent to Roger with the email subject, “Simply Statistics Logo Contest” The logo must be generated with reproducible R code.
